body:
Fixes https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/13792
Fixes #13930 

https://github.com/spack/spack/commit/99dfff447509a68d672a82812e5abfbc463b6d26 updated `perl` to add `perl`'s `bin/` directory to `PATH` but does not filter it when it is a system path. This removes that logic from the `perl` package because adding `bin` for a given package is already handled in Spack core (and it includes filtering logic for system dirs)
title: Handle external perl
